articles.author: Jordan Mendoza
articles.title: No. 2 Indiana survives thriller vs Penn State with incredible Omar Cooper Jr. catch - USA Today
articles.description: Indiana football survived a thriller against PSU, thanks largely to a miraculous catch from Omar Cooper Jr. in the final minute of the game.
articles.content:
No. 2 Indiana football has survived.
The Hoosiers remain undefeated after an incredible last-minute touchdown from Omar Cooper Jr. to stay undefeated and avoid the upset of Penn State with a 27-24 w… [+2691 chars]
